Source.Name: mate-media
Source.Description: This package contains a few media utilities for the MATE desktop, including a volume control.

Source.Name: mate-calc
Source.Summary: Calculator for the Mate desktop environment
Source.Description: mate-calc, Mate masaüstü için hesap makinesi.
mate-calc, Mate masaüstü için hesap makinesi.

Source.Name: caja-dropbox
Source.Description: Dropbox for Caja.

Source.Name: mate-system-monitor
Source.Description: Process viewer and system resource monitor for MATE

Source.Name: mate-text-editor
Source.Description: mate masaüstü için metin editörü.
mate masaüstü için metin editörü.

Source.Name: mate-menu-editor
Source.Description: Easy MATE menu editing tool.

Source.Name: python-caja
Source.Description: These are unstable bindings for the caja extension library.

Source.Name: mate-file-manager-image-converter
Source.Summary: Caja-Image-Converter is a fork of Nautilus-Image-Converter.
Source.Description: The Caja-Image-Converter extension allows you to resize/rotate images from Caja.

Source.Name: mate-utils
Source.Description: The mate-utils package contains a set of small "desk accessory" utility applications for MATE, such as a dictionary, a disk usage analyzer, a screenshot tool and others.

Source.Name: mate-terminal
Source.Description: mate-terminal, masaüstü için terminal uygulaması.
mate-terminal, masaüstü için terminal uygulaması.

Source.Name: mate-file-manager-open-terminal
Source.Description: The mate-file-manager-open-terminal extension provides a right-click "Open Terminal" option for mate-file-manager users who prefer that option.

Source.Name: mate-file-manager-sendto
Source.Summary: caja-sendto is a fork of nautilus-sendto
Source.Description: Caja extension for sending files to locations.

Source.Name: mate-document-viewer
Source.Description: mate-document-viewer, mate masaüstü için döküman görüntüleyicidir.

Source.Name: mate-power-manager
Source.Description: Power management tool for the MATE desktop.

Source.Name: mate-applets
Source.Description: Applets for the MATE Desktop and Panel

Source.Name: mate-indicator-applet
Source.Summary: A small applet to display information from various applications consistently in the panel.
Source.Description: A small applet to display information from various applications consistently in the panel. The indicator applet exposes Ayatana Indicators in the MATE Panel.

Source.Name: libindicator
Source.Summary: A set of symbols and convience functions that all indicators would like to use.
Source.Description: Libary with a set of symbols and convience functions that all indicators would like to use (GTK+ 2 library)

Source.Name: mate-file-manager-gksu
Source.Summary: This is a fork of nautilus-gksu.
Source.Description: mate-file-manager-gksu (a fork of nautilus-gksu for the MATE).

Source.Name: mate-netspeed
Source.Description: This is a fork of GNOME netspeed applet.

Source.Name: mate-image-viewer
Source.Description: mate-image-viewer, resim görüntüleyicisidir.
mate-image-viewer, resim görüntüleyicisidir.

Source.Name: mate-file-archiver
Source.Summary: Engrampa is an archive manager for the MATE environment.
Source.Description: Engrampa is an archive manager for the MATE environment. This means that you can create and modify archives; view the content of an archive; view and modify a file contained in the archive; extract files from the archive.

Source.Name: liboobs
Source.Summary: Liboobs is a wrapping library to the System Tools Backends.
Source.Description: Liboobs is a wrapping library to the System Tools Backends.

Source.Name: mate-character-map
Source.Description: Unicode character map viewer

Source.Name: mate-screensaver
Source.Summary: Replaces xscreensaver, integrating with the MATE desktop.
Replaces xscreensaver, integrating with the MATE desktop.
Source.Description: mate-screensaver, Mate masaüstü için ekrankoruyucu uygulamasıdır.

Source.Name: mate-user-share
Source.Summary: User level public file sharing via WebDAV or ObexFTP
Source.Description: mate-user-share is a small package that binds together various free software projects to bring easy to use user-level file sharing to the masses.

Source.Name: mate-bluetooth
Source.Description: Mate masaüstüsü için bluetooth sağlayıcısı.
Mate masaüstüsü için bluetooth sağlayıcısı.

Source.Name: mate-sensors-applet
Source.Summary: Display readings from hardware sensors in your MATE panel.
Source.Description: MATE Sensors Applet is an applet for the MATE Panel to display readings from hardware sensors, including CPU temperature, fan speeds and voltage readings under Linux.on.

Source.Name: mate-file-manager-share
Source.Summary: Allows to quickly share a folder from the MATE Caja file manager
Source.Description: Allows to quickly share a folder from the MATE Caja file manager.

Source.Name: mate-system-tools
Source.Description: MATE System Tools package is a fork of GNOME System Τοols package.

Source.Name: mate-window-manager
Source.Description: Marco is a small window manager, using GTK+ to do everything.
Marco herşeyi yapmak için GTK+ kullanan, küçük bir pencere yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: mate-desktop
Source.Description: mate-desktop contains basic Mate libraries and information applications.
mate-desktop, Mate kullanıcı ortamının paylaşımlı bileşenlerini içeren temel pakettir.

Source.Name: mate-menus
Source.Description: mate-menus has got desktop-directories, Mate menus library and its python bindings.
mate-menus, Mate masaüstü dizinlerini, kitaplıklarını ve python bağlayıcılarını içerir.

Source.Name: mate-common
Source.Summary: Common files for development of Mate packages
Mate uygulamalarının geliştirmede kullandığı yaygın dosyalar
Source.Description: maate-common package contains aclocal macros, makefile headers and documents tools in order to build Mate sources.
mate-common, MATE ortamı için autoconf, automake ve libtool uzantısıdır.

Source.Name: mate-themes
Source.Description: mate-themes, mate masaüstü temalarını barındırır.
mate-themes, mate masaüstü temalarını barındırır.

Source.Name: mate-keyring
Source.Description: The mate-keyring session daemon manages passwords and other types of secrets for the user, storing them encrypted with a main password. Applications can use the mate-keyring library to integrate with the keyring.

Source.Name: mate-polkit
Source.Description: mate-polkit package provides an authentication agent for polkit that integrates well with the Mate desktop environment.
mate-polkit paketi Mate masaüstü ortamı ile bütünleşmiş bir kimlik denetim yardımcısı sağlar.

Source.Name: libmatewnck
Source.Summary: Window Navigator Construction Kit for MATE
Source.Description: libmatewnck is Window Navigator Construction Kit, i.e. a library to use for writing pagers and taskslists and stuff.

Source.Name: mate-panel
Source.Description: GNOME panel is located in the edge of screen that provides contains widgets such as application launcher, cpu monitor and workspace switcher.
Mate paneli ekranın kenarlarında bulunur ve programcıkları (işlemci yükü, program başlatıcısı, çalışma alanı değiştiricisi gibi) barındırmayı sağlar.

Source.Name: libmatekeyring
Source.Description: libmatekeyring is a library that used by applications to integrate with the mate-keyring system.
libmate-keyring, mate-keyring sistemine uyumlu olmak için programlar tarafından kullanılan bir kitaplığıdır.

Source.Name: mate-backgrounds
Source.Summary: Default wallpapers for the Mate desktop
Mate masaüstü için öntanımlı duvar kağıtları
Source.Description: gnome-backgrounds contains default wallpapers for the Mate desktop.
mate-backgrounds, Mate masaüstü için öntanımlı duvar kağıtlarını içerir.

Source.Name: libmateweather
Source.Description: libmateweather is a collection of documentation utilities for the Mate project.
libmateweather Mate Projesi'nin bir parçasıdır.

Source.Name: mate-settings-daemon
Source.Summary: System settings daemon for GNOME desktop
Source.Description: gnome-settings-daemon shares GNOME specific settings with other applications via DBus connection.

Source.Name: mate-file-manager
Source.Summary: Default file manager for the Mate desktop.
Mate masasütü için öntanımlı dosya yöneticisi
Source.Description: Caja is a file manager that allows to browse directories, preview files and launch applications.
Caja; dizinlerde gezinmeyi, dosyaları gözatmayı ve uygulamalar başlatmayı sağlayan bir dosya yöneticisidir.

Source.Name: mate-icon-theme
Source.Description: mate-icon-theme package contains the default icon theme used by the Mate desktop.
mate-icon-theme paketi, Mate masaüstü tarafından kullanılan öntanımlı simge temasını içerir.

Source.Name: mate-session-manager
Source.Description: MATE session manager, as well as a configuration program to choose applications starting on login.

Source.Name: mate-icon-theme-faenza
Source.Summary: Faenza Icon theme for MATE Desktop
Source.Description: mate-icon-theme-faenza, Mate masaüstü için Faenza icon temasıdır.
Mate masaüstü için Faenza icon temasıdır.

Source.Name: mate-dialogs
Source.Description: mate-dialogs is a part of Mate project.
mate-dialogs, Mate projesinin bir parçasıdır.

Source.Name: mate-doc-utils
Source.Summary: A collection of documentation utilities for the Mate project
Mate projesi için döküman araçları takımı
Source.Description: mate-doc-utils is a collection of documentation utilities for the Mate project.
mate-doc-utils Mate projesinde kullanılan belgelendirme araçlarını içermektedir.

Source.Name: mate-control-center
Source.Description: mate-control-center is Mate's main interface for configuration of various aspects of your Mate desktop.
mate-control-center Mate masaüstünüzün çeşitli ayarlarını değiştiren, Mate'in ana arayüzüdür.

Source.Name: mate-notification-daemon
Source.Description: mate-notification-daemon is the server implementation of the Mate desktop notification specification.
mate-notification-daemon Mate projesinin masaüstü bilgilendirme hizmeti uygulamasını içerir.

Source.Name: libmatekbd
Source.Description: libgnomekbd contains a GNOME library that manages keyboard layout settings and its panel applet.
Bu paket klavye ayarlarını yöneten bir Mate kütüphanesi ve onun panel programcığını içerir.
